subject: Golf
PGA Championship
lead_paragraph: Protecting a four-shot lead in Sunday’s final round of the BMW Championship, Day had set his sights on overtaking Rory McIlroy as the top-ranked player in the world golf rankings.
snippet: Protecting a four-shot lead in Sunday’s final round of the BMW Championship, Day had set his sights on overtaking Rory McIlroy as the top-ranked player in the world golf rankings.
